Properties.commandText:
CREATE TABLE [Addresses] (
    [Id] int NOT NULL IDENTITY,
    [Email] nvarchar(45) NULL,
    [Phone] nvarchar(45) NULL,
    [Region] nvarchar(45) NULL,
    [City] nvarchar(45) NULL,
    [Subcity] nvarchar(45) NULL,
    [Country] nvarchar(45) NULL,
    [POBOX] nvarchar(45) NULL,
    [Created] datetime2 NOT NULL,
    [CreatedBy] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [LastModified] datetime2 NULL,
    [LastModifiedBy] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    CONSTRAINT [PK_Addresses] PRIMARY KEY ([Id])
);

CREATE TABLE [Containers] (
    [Id] int NOT NULL IDENTITY,
    [ContianerNumber] nvarchar(45) NOT NULL,
    [Size] real NOT NULL,
    [Owner] nvarchar(45) NULL,
    [LocationPortId] int NOT NULL,
    [ManufacturedDate] datetime2 NULL,
    [OperationId] int NOT NULL,
    [TruckAssignmentId] int NOT NULL,
    [Image] varbinary(max) NULL,
    [Created] datetime2 NOT NULL,
    [CreatedBy] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [LastModified] datetime2 NULL,
    [LastModifiedBy] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    CONSTRAINT [PK_Containers] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]),
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Containers_Operations_OperationId] FOREIGN KEY ([OperationId]) REFERENCES [Operations] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Containers_Ports_LocationPortId] FOREIGN KEY ([LocationPortId]) REFERENCES [Ports] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Containers_TruckAssignments_TruckAssignmentId] FOREIGN KEY ([TruckAssignmentId]) REFERENCES [TruckAssignments] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE [Containers] (
    [Id] int NOT NULL IDENTITY,
    [ContianerNumber] nvarchar(45) NOT NULL,
    [Size] real NOT NULL,
    [Owner] nvarchar(45) NULL,
    [LocationPortId] int NOT NULL,
    [ManufacturedDate] datetime2 NULL,
    [OperationId] int NOT NULL,
    [TruckAssignmentId] int NOT NULL,
    [Image] varbinary(max) NULL,
    [Created] datetime2 NOT NULL,
    [CreatedBy] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    [LastModified] datetime2 NULL,
    [LastModifiedBy] nvarchar(max) NULL,
    CONSTRAINT [PK_Containers] PRIMARY KEY ([Id]),
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Containers_Operations_OperationId] FOREIGN KEY ([OperationId]) REFERENCES [Operations] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Containers_Ports_LocationPortId] FOREIGN KEY ([LocationPortId]) REFERENCES [Ports] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    CONSTRAINT [FK_Containers_TruckAssignments_TruckAssignmentId] FOREIGN KEY ([TruckAssignmentId]) REFERENCES [TruckAssignments] ([Id]) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
